A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I have some very mixed feelings about this movie:

Pros:
1. Great cinematography
2. New\, diverse characters
3. Interesting parallels to the original trilogy

Cons:
1. Hardcore missed opportunities with both classic and new characters
2. Poor character development
3. Plot elements that are irrelevant and don't make sense\, they're just added to make the film longer.
4. There is a scene that defies all logic that shouldn't have played out the way it did\, yet somehow it was thought to be a good idea.
5. Rose
